title: Update: Suspect arrested over Atulugama girl's death confesses to murder
body_lines: A 29-year-old man who was taken into custody over the death of the 9-year old girl from Atulugama had reportedly confessed committing the murder.
Police said several statements were recorded into the death of the girl and CID is conducting further investigations.
Meanwhile, post mortem investigations into the girl's death was conducted today at the Panadura Hospital.
The body of the girl who went missing on Friday was recovered on Saturday at a marshy land near her house in Atulugama. The suspect to be produced in the court.
